document_data.name: Cargunn
document_data.mainbody: Major '''Cargunn''' was the proprietor of the well-stocked [[Major Cargunn's Military and Equipment Shoppe]] in [[Eshpurta]], [[Amn]], in the [[1367 DR|Year of the Shield, 1367 DR]]. He was a retired officer of the local [[Shield Militia]] but rumors said he had certain "expertise" that kept him involved with Militia operations.
